synopsis.text: Not a single criminal can escape the watchful eyes of the dynamic duo, Miyuki Kobayakawa and Natsumi Tsujimoto, as they patrol the bustling city of Tokyo. With Miyuki's impressive mechanical skills and Natsumi's unyielding determination, they face off against an array of miscreants, from high-tech underwear thieves to the common pickpocket. Whether it's dealing with the peculiar antics of geriatric gearheads or the relentless pursuit of peeping toms, these two policewomen never fail to bring justice to the streets. As they navigate through these chaotic adventures, the only uncertainty remains: will Natsumi's bank account survive until her next payday? Join this wacky pair as they prove that crime never pays in these entertaining special episodes of "You're under Arrest!"
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
